Hearthfire and

___________________________

INSTALLATION
___________________________

Simply drag the files into your skyrim directory and tick the box in the launcher/Mod manage

___________________________

Dawnguard
___________________________

talk to a guard anytime over lv 20 (I think)

____________________________

Hearthfire
____________________________

you will receive a letter from a courier at lv 20+ (Again I think)
author: Bethesda and tiger1667
